name: chatwoot
description: Chatwoot is an open-source customer engagement suite that provides live chat, shared inboxes, social media integration, and automation. It offers multi-channel communication and is a viable alternative to Intercom or Zendesk.

features.title: Customer Engagement
features.description: Complete suite for customer communication. All-in-one platform

features.title: Live Chat
features.description: Real-time chat widget for your website. Instant support

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Team inbox for email, chat, and social media. Unified communication

features.title: Social Integration
features.description: Connect Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, and more. Multi-channel

features.title: Automation
features.description: Chatbots and automated workflows. Efficient support

features.title: Intercom Alternative
features.description: Open-source alternative to expensive platforms. Cost-effective

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over customer data. Privacy guaranteed
